post.body: Yeah...guy won huge...women had a tight (and sloppy) game abd pulled away at the end. Won by ten.
Yup...that was me wearin' the stripes! Haha!
yup yup! I'll get paid this weekend from UTSA along with my financial aid, so I'll be fine!
You're kidding, right? I don't have a nickle to my name! Still waiting for @eggomez to get me my $$$!
Well get it fixed dammit! I need to be able to get in touch with you for hoops!
What the heck is going on with your phone. You missed some serious hoops this morning bro...played for 3 hours! One short, too!
yeah...men play Friday...girls Saturday. What are you doing in the morning? We are hooping at 9am...
Saw the final score...boo on that! Was it a good game? UTSA women won their 3rd in a row, so that was good!
I need you to call me as soon as you get this. Don't matter the time. Go to facebook for my number since your cell is busted. ...
Dude...you don't need to name your Blackberry, period! Did you name your iPod, too? It's a little much, bro!
Dude, please tell me you did not actually give your Blackberry a name! You couldn't be more creative than BB?
Kurt Thomas is THE MAN!!
Was thinking about coming down there after the UTSA game, but it was already late third qtr. Coulda been there for this!
They don't play until 7pm, but I got here early to hoop with some of the guys.
Haha! Guess you saved your job for one more night eh bro?!?! I'm at UTSA...women's starting center just beat me 2 out of 3 in ...
You know it! Massage and pedicure, also!
So dinner for three tonight?! :-)
Chef Boy-Ar-Dee
Eating dinner with both my brothers for New Years!
First UTSA men's basketball game in three weeks tonight! Well...home game that is...
